Buy Bitcoin with AstroPay

by Jordan Tuwiner

AstroPay is a cash and online payment method that is widely used in Latin America. Users can buy bitcoin with AstroPay by buying an AstroPay voucher with cash, or via online banking solutions.

Bitex.la Buy Bitcoin

Bitcoin exchange with service in many South American countries. Deposit with cash or AstroPay.

Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io Buy Bitcoin

Buy bitcoin via credit card, SEPA/ACH bank transfer, cash, or AstroPay.

Buy Bitcoin

The list below contains the same companies listed above, but with more information about fees, countries supported, and more additional details.

Bitex.la Buy Bitcoin

Bitex.la is a Bitcoin exchange based in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Users in Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Chile, Peru and Uruguay can fund their exchange account with AstroPay. The fee for funding with AstroPay is 2.5%, plus an additional 0.5% per trade made on the exchange. Deposits made via AstroPay will take 2-10 days to be credited to your account. After verifying your identity you can deposit up to $3,000 per month. Verifying further by providing a picture of a utility bill will let you buy up to $10,000 worth of bitcoin per month.

Buy Bitcoin

CEX.io Buy Bitcoin

CEX.IO is a bitcoin exchange and broker based in London. Users in Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, Chile, Peru, Uruguay, China and Turkey can buy bitcoin with AstroPay at CEX.IO. A flat 2.5% fee is charged on all purchases, and users can buy up to $2,000 worth of bitcoins per day and up to $4,000 worth of bitcoins per month.

Buy Bitcoin

If none of the companies above suit your needs, try buying bitcoin with cash or credit card. To find more places to buy bitcoin in your country use our country index.

Note: Buy bitcoin at your own risk. We only recommend companies we find and can't guarantee the security of your funds. We recommend buying bitcoin and immediately moving it to a wallet you own.
